Jose Canseco

Regards,
Jose Canseco

looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Inflamed Hamstring Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Ramon Ortiz
Dear Sir,
Ramon Ortiz has nothing more to prove at AA Trenton Thunder!
He has an ERA of 3.55 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Status of Marcos Lopez
Dear Sir,
Marcos Lopez isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Trenton Thunder!
He has an AVG of .226, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Todd Stottlemyre
